section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on August 21, 2022.*
section.heading: Rulemaking.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on August 21, 2022.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 9 of Career Mobility Action Plan Program Establishment Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-433, May 23, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
